${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:SealTheDeal.NAME: Seal the Deal
${modID}:SealTheDeal.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Housed to an enemy that has at most 2 ${modID}:Renting.
${modID}:SealTheDeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Housed to an enemy that has at most 2 ${modID}:Renting.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't house the enemy if it has more than 2 #rRenting

${modID}:Eviction.NAME: Eviction
${modID}:Eviction.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has more than !M! ${modID}:Sheltered, remove it.
${modID}:Eviction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If the enemy has more than !M! ${modID}:Sheltered, remove it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't evict enemies with less than %d #rSheltered.

${modID}:RatInfestation.NAME: Rat Infestation
${modID}:RatInfestation.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison to ${modID}:Sheltered enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:Graffiti.NAME: Graffiti
${modID}:Graffiti.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Apply !M! *Mark and 1 Weak to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:DodgeTheAllegations.NAME: Dodge the Allegations
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:StainOnShirt.NAME: Stain on your Shirt
${modID}:StainOnShirt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark. NL Gain Block equal to the enemy's *Mark.

${modID}:BreakTheWindows.NAME: Break the Windows
${modID}:BreakTheWindows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Repeat for each ${modID}:Sheltered stack above !M!, then remove it.

${modID}:CallForMaintenance.NAME: Call for Maintenance
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:PipeBurst.NAME: Pipe Burst
${modID}:PipeBurst.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the amount of ${modID}:Sheltered stacks the enemy has.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:DriveBy.NAME: Drive-By
${modID}:DriveBy.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:DumpTheTrash.NAME: Dump the Trash
${modID}:DumpTheTrash.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Discard up to !M! cards, gaining 4 Vigor per card discarded this way.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:RaiseRent.NAME: Raise the Rent
${modID}:RaiseRent.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Next turn, draw !M! and gain !M! energy for each ${modID}:Sheltered enemy. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:StealTheMail.NAME: Steal the Mail
${modID}:StealTheMail.DESCRIPTION: Steal an enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Dependency.NAME: Dependency
${modID}:Dependency.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL ALL enemies gain !M! Block. NL ALL enemies gain Barricade. NL Apply ${modID}:Dependent to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:PowerfulDecor.NAME: Powerful Decor
${modID}:PowerfulDecor.DESCRIPTION: For each ${modID}:Sheltered enemy, gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength.

${modID}:CutTheFunding.NAME: Cut the Funding
${modID}:CutTheFunding.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When you play a card with ${modID}:Invest, lose !M! less *Gold.

${modID}:OverflowingPockets.NAME: Overflowing Pockets
${modID}:OverflowingPockets.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Cards that ${modID}:Invest more than !M! are played twice.

${modID}:IOwnThisPlace.NAME: I Own This Place
${modID}:IOwnThisPlace.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL Deal damage equal to the damage the enemy intents to do.
${modID}:IOwnThisPlace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Invest !${modID}:Invest!. NL The enemy loses HP equal to the damage they intent to do.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough #rGold to play this card!

${modID}:PickPocket.NAME: Pickpocket
${modID}:PickPocket.DESCRIPTION: When you deal unblocked damage, gain !M! *Gold.
